message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $175. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can do $160. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $170. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above $170. I can do $155. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $165. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I understand you're willing to make one more concession, but I'm still not sure if $165 is the right price for me. I can do $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
